title: IDerivedPatternFeatureData.ForceUseSeedConfiguration
description: Gets or sets whether to synchronize the configuration of pattern components with the configuration of the seed component in this derived pattern feature.
returns: True to use the seed component configuration for all pattern components, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to true, the
Referenced configuration
section of the Component Properties dialog is disabled, and you cannot use
IComponent2::ReferencedConfiguration
to change the pattern instance configuration.
